channel.title: java.io.IOException: Not connected Error
channel.description:
I've double checked my installation and everything seems to be set up correctly, but even if I start a patch with just one module it throws an error and won't go live.
Generate code complete MODULE_PATHS= compiling C:\Users\mafgar\DOCUME~1\AXOLOT~1.0/build/xpatch.cpp linking C:\Users\mafgar\DOCUME~1\AXOLOT~1.0/build/xpatch.dbg.elf C:\Users\mafgar\DOCUME~1\AXOLOT~1.0/build/xpatch.elf : section size addr .text 224 0 .rodata 548 0 .init_array 0 0 .fini_array 0 0 .comment 128 0 .ARM.attributes 57 0 Total 957
Done compiling patch java.io.IOException: Not connected java.io.IOException: Not connected at axoloti.connection.USBBulkConnection_v2.transmitPacket1(USBBulkConnection_v2.java:415) at axoloti.connection.USBBulkConnection_v2.sendAndGetReplyPtr(USBBulkConnection_v2.java:677) at axoloti.connection.USBBulkConnection_v2.mem_alloc(USBBulkConnection_v2.java:797) at axoloti.connection.USBBulkConnection_v2.transmitStartLive(USBBulkConnection_v2.java:694) at axoloti.live.patch.PatchViewLive.lambda$goLive$9(PatchViewLive.java:314) at axoloti.job.JobProcessor.lambda$exec$0(JobProcessor.java:21) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1149) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:624) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748)

item.title: java.io.IOException: Not connected Error
item.dc:creator: @mafgar
item.description:
@mafgar wrote:

Just to follow up, I downgraded to the firmware before 2.0 and it works great.

Read full topic
